reply: The Mona Lisa is a portrait whose smile conceals subtle emotion and sfumato technique.
In The Last Supper I sought to capture the instant of astonishment when I spoke 'one of you will betray me'.
I studied birds to design wings; my ornithopter was powered by human strength—alas, insufficient to take flight.
The Vitruvian Man explores human proportion—geometry as a mirror of nature.
